```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(pander)
library(dplyr)
```


```{r table, echo=FALSE, results='asis'}
tbl<-read.table("cellLines.csv", sep = ",", header = TRUE)
colnames(tbl) <- c("Cell Line", "Organism", "Type", "Grade", "NF2 Status")
tbl<- filter(tbl, `Cell Line` != "Syn13", `Cell Line` != "Syn14" )
tbl<- filter(tbl, `Cell Line` != "Syn13", `Cell Line` != "Syn14" )

pander(tbl)
```
